Bedfont®ScientificLimited在Megagrowth 50奖项2025中排名第28每年庆祝的Megagrowth 50奖颁奖典礼都认可了肯特和梅德威增长最快的私有企业。 Bedfont®Scientific，呼吸分析的世界领导者，拥有超过48年的设计和制造医疗呼吸分析设备的经验，很高兴能在2025年前50名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/bedfontc2ae-scientific-limited-ranks-28th-in-megagrowth-50-50-Awards-20255.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/bedfontc2ae-scientific-limited-ranks-28th-in-megagrowth-50-50-awards-awards-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80dc9fc0-db66-41E7-9CA3-C0AFE0CE6698 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 08:12:00 -0400 Bedfont® Scientific Limited ranks 28th in MegaGrowth 50 awards 2025
医疗量身定制的餐点改善了NYU Langone Health的患者康复NYU Langone的健康状况认识到营养在患者康复中的重要性，将餐点送入患者的曼哈顿和布鲁克林校园的出院计划，通过与我们提供的上帝的爱的自筹资金合作，根据患者的饮食需求和偏好为您提供的饮食需求和偏好提供了可定制的饮食，他们离开医院后，他们提供了可定制的餐食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/medally-tailorcy-meals-improve-patient-recovery-recovery-at-nyu-langone-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/medally-tailordaly-tailored-meals-improve-patient-recovery-recovery-at-nyu-langone-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b0bec86-ce62-4d21-93c2-e80df849630e Thu, 27 Mar 2025 07:43:00 -0400 Medically tailored meals improve patient recovery at NYU Langone Health
在围困下，很少有牙医和氟化物，美国农村风险新的蛀牙激增在阿肯色州北部的树木繁茂的高地，小镇几乎没有牙医，为超过20,000人提供服务的水官员拒绝在饮用水中添加氟化物，从而公开违反了州法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/with-few-dentists-and-b--fluoride-under-under-siege-rural-america-rallas----------------------------------------- of-tooth-decay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/with-few-dentists-and-b--fluoride-under-under-siege-rural---------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3456fa3-AD75-46ED-9951-2D8E1194355E Thu, 27 Mar 2025 07:30:23 -0400 With few dentists and fluoride under siege, rural America risks new surge of tooth decay
特朗普将无家可归的反应从住房转移到强迫治疗唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）总统正在誓言一种新的方法，通过强行将居住在大型营地的人迁移到大型营地的同时，同时强制进行心理健康和成瘾待遇，这是远离美国领先的无家可归政策的积极偏离，数十年来，这是对危机的最有效方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/trump-turns-homeless-homeless-response-away-away-from-housing-toward-forced-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/trump-turns-homeless-homeless-response-response-away-from-housing-toward-toward-forced-forced-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ce274EA-51B2-4B29-A207-A207-A0E6B33383406 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 07:24:00 -0400 Trump turns homelessness response away from housing, toward forced treatment
AFM上的对话：探索活细胞的纳米力学在这次访谈中，克里斯蒂娜·库施·维霍格（Kristina Kusche-Vihrog）博士在这次采访中谈到了活细胞的纳米力学及其对心血管疾病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/conversations-conversations-on-afm-exploring-the-nanomechanics-fiving-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/conversations-on-an-afm-exploring-the-nanomechanics-fiving-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfc03c1d-2-fbb-4152-b647-f4924ba72e7a Thu, 27 Mar 2025 06:40:00 -0400 Conversations on AFM: Exploring the nanomechanics of living cells

通过3D成像技术增强皮肤癌筛查3D摄影改善黑色素瘤早期发现的潜力是对医学界兴趣越来越多的话题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/enhancing-skin-cancer-screening-with-3d-mimaging-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/enhancing-skin-cancer-screening-with-3d-mimaging-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adf1df7a-0C67-4AE3-8868-AE4EB11D0077 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 03:08:13 -0400 Enhancing skin cancer screening with 3D imaging technology
抑制无系统性毒性的小鼠肿瘤异种移植生长乳腺癌的管理涉及各种治疗方法。但是，许多当前的抗癌治疗措施不加区分损害癌细胞和健康细胞。在癌症治疗中，链霉菌已经被证明是产生抗癌药物的主要资源。 Coelicolor链霉菌是链霉菌属的代表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ iNHIBETION-of-tumor-xenograft-growth-newognograft-growth-in-in-mice-without-systy-systynic-toxicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ iNHIBETION-of-tumor-xenograft-growth-in--in-in-mice-n-mice without-systy-systynic-toxicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c19ef76-A1CF-4BCC-B632-D04279A39247 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:54:53 -0400 Inhibition of tumor xenograft growth in mice without systemic toxicity
在DMH中揭示瘦素信号传导以产生代谢作用彭宁顿生物医学研究中心的科学家在控制代谢，体温和能量使用的大脑区域和神经元中获得了更大的清晰度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/unveiling-leptin-signaling-in-the-the-dmh-for-metabolic-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/unveiling-leptin-signaling-in-the-the-the-dmh-for-metabolic-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B79954C5-744D-4225-9855-C4EFCF720C27 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:42:05 -0400 Unveiling leptin signaling in the DMH for metabolic effects
对肿瘤微环境和胃癌治疗的新见解一支新加坡科学家团队在理解胃癌方面做出了重大发现，这种疾病仍然是全球最致命的癌症之一。通过使用先进的映射技术，他们创建了一个详细的胃肿瘤“地图集”，从而揭示了癌细胞的表现，发展和与环境相互作用的隐藏模式。这些见解可能会导致更精确，有针对性的治疗方法，以提高存活率并降低副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/novel-insights-into-tumor-microenvironment-and-microenvironment-and-gastrec-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/novel-insights-into-tumor-microenvironment-and-microenvorment-and-gastrec-cancer-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dd533d1-0247-425a-425a-A271-1c043f65d732 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:31:53 -0400 Novel insights into tumor microenvironment and gastric cancer therapy
